original_title: The Warm Blood Of A Dying Man
overview: No one knows how an apocalypse began. A mysterious plague that killed millions of human lives and yet it is known  only cigarettes can be the cure. In the midst of all that, Walter (19), a young man who is also infected with the plague, tries to survive  by searching for the owner of the last cigarette on Earth, Truman (19).
title: The Warm Blood Of A Dying Man
